product_name: Mountaineers Books Snowshoe Routes: Washington - 2nd Edition
long_description: Find Washington's 100 best snowshoe routes with this popular guide. Author: Dan A. Nelson. Softcover; 269 pages; 101 maps, 109 black-and-white photos. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2003; 2nd edition. Expanded second edition includes 20 new routes and more beginner level trails. There are outings for all skill levels, from beginner to experienced mountaineer. Many are within easy driving distance from Puget Sound metropolitan regions; most trips start from Sno-Park areas for easy access. New trip planning chart compares trails at a glance with trail data and scenic highlight, helping you narrow down your choices. Supplies tips on technique and selecting the snowshoes that are right for you.
short_description: Find Washington's 100 best snowshoe routes with this popular guide.
